mapper.update: update ext_jxl_credit_report t1 set t1.fk_invest_id =#{dto.fkInvestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.success =#{dto.success,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.note =#{dto.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.report_id =#{dto.reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.request_time =#{dto.requestTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.report_time =#{dto.reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.queried_name =#{dto.queriedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.queried_papers =#{dto.queriedPapers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.queried_number =#{dto.queriedNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.query_marriage =#{dto.queryMarriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.token =#{dto.token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.data_source =#{dto.dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.version =#{dto.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.error_code =#{dto.errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.error_msg =#{dto.errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.create_time =#{dto.respMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_time =systimestamp, t1.sys_code =#{dto.sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.interface_id =#{dto.interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
